actions.subcommittee: Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice

official_title: A bill to provide that no Federal court may require the expenditure of Federal or State funds without prior legislative authorization.

summary.text: Judicial Restraint Act - Prohibits the Supreme Court or any other Federal court from making a decision or issuing an order which requires a Federal or State expenditures for a specific purpose unless Congress or the State legislature has authorized and appropriated funds for such purpose. Subjects to impeachment a justice or judge who violates such prohibition, including a justice or judge concurring in such a decision or order.

titles.title: A bill to provide that no Federal court may require the expenditure of Federal or State funds without prior legislative authorization.
